episode_event_specialcos02_ch0109_40_kud:
Before the tea party, Emmet was walking around
and saw Piers, who was in the middle of
a performance.
What a great song!

There’s no Battle Subway on Pasio, so I can’t
serve as a Subway Boss.

Besides riddles, tea, and sweets, what can I offer
as a butler?
I know! I can entertain with a song!

If you wanna entertain through song, maybe my
big brother can help.
Marnie told me everything.
I’m glad you were moved by my song, but...

I’m sure there are other ways to apply yourself
that’re more suitable for a butler.
Then...how can I be more like a butler?

I’m not sure, since we haven’t got any butlers
back in Spikemuth.

We did, however, have a lot of freedom. That’s
why I was able to sing.

If you stay true to yourself, people will follow
your lead.
But if you’re still unsure of yourself...

You blow those worries away with a
Pokémon battle!

I still don’t know what I should do to serve as
a butler!

When working on trains and music, overthinking 
can throw everything off track…

It’s important to keep others in mind, but don’t
forget about your own feelings!
My own feelings?

I’m not sure if this is a useful “hint,” but my big
brother “expresses” himself through song.

For both Subway Bosses and butlers, I think it’s
important to not ignore your heart.
Be mindful of my own heart...and not just others!

Right, then. Here’s a question from me in the form
of a tea-party riddle!

Aside from being helpful to your customers, what’s
another thing you can be that’ll show them your
creative side?

Bring at least one sync pair who you think
matches the answer!

The answer is “artistic.” I should express what’s in
my heart!

What a great battle. I can see that my soul has
reached you now.

Yes, thank you! I think I’ve realized
something important!

The reason your song moved me was because I
could feel your heart and soul in it.

If I can express my joy, my customers can enjoy it
as well.

I want to entertain, and the customers want to be
entertained. Both are valid feelings.

I’ll wear my heart on my sleeve and make this the
best tea party yet!

That’s the spirit. I can see the conviction in
your face.

I’ve got nothing against tea parties. Marnie an’ I
will stop by for some tea.

Uh...I already promised Gloria and the others I
would go with them...
Fine. Do you want to come with us, Big Bro?

I’ll be waiting to serve you, with my heart on
my sleeve!

Because I am Emmet!
Butler-Subway-Boss extraordinaire!
